org.apache.flink.metrics.jmx

类 JMXReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.metrics.jmx.JMXReporter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    MetricReporter

    public class JMXReporter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MetricReporter
    MetricReporter that exports Metrics via JMX.

    Largely based on the JmxReporter class of the dropwizard metrics library https://github.com/dropwizard/metrics/blob/master/metrics-core/src/main/java/io/dropwizard/metrics/JmxReporter.java

    • 嵌套类概要

      The MBean interface for an exposed counter.

      static interface  JMXReporter.JmxGaugeMBean
      The MBean interface for an exposed gauge.
      private static class  JMXReporter.JmxHistogram 
      static interface  JMXReporter.JmxHistogramMBean
      The MBean interface for an exposed histogram.
      private static class  JMXReporter.JmxMeter 
      static interface  JMXReporter.JmxMeterMBean
      The MBean interface for an exposed meter.
      private static class  JMXReporter.JMXServer
      JMX Server implementation that JMX clients can connect to.
      static interface  JMXReporter.MetricMBean
      The common MBean interface for all metrics.

    • 方法详细资料

      • open

        public void open(MetricConfig config)
        从接口复制的说明: MetricReporter
        Configures this reporter. Since reporters are instantiated generically and hence parameter-less, this method is the place where the reporters set their basic fields based on configuration values.

        This method is always called first on a newly instantiated reporter.

        指定者:
        open 在接口中 MetricReporter
        参数:
        config - A properties object that contains all parameters set for this reporter.

      • close

        public void close()
        从接口复制的说明: MetricReporter
        Closes this reporter. Should be used to close channels, streams and release resources.
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 MetricReporter

      • getPort

        public int getPort()

      • notifyOfAddedMetric

        public void notifyOfAddedMetric(Metric metric,
                                java.lang.String metricName,
                                MetricGroup group)
        从接口复制的说明: MetricReporter
        Called when a new Metric was added.
        指定者:
        notifyOfAddedMetric 在接口中 MetricReporter
        参数:
        metric - the metric that was added
        metricName - the name of the metric
        group - the group that contains the metric

      • replaceInvalidChars

        static java.lang.String replaceInvalidChars(java.lang.String str)
        Lightweight method to replace unsupported characters. If the string does not contain any unsupported characters, this method creates no new string (and in fact no new objects at all).

        Replacements:

        • " is removed
        • space is replaced by _ (underscore)
        • , = ; : ? ' * are replaced by - (hyphen)
